original: Vajravidāraṇī
namo bhagavatya āryamahāvajravidāraṇāyai /
analyzed: namaḥ bhagavatyaḥ ārya mahā vajra vidāraṇāyai

original: namo buddhāya //
analyzed: namaḥ buddhāya

original: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān vajreṣu viharati sma /
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān vajreṣu viharati sma

original: sarvaśarīraṃ vajramayam adhiṣṭhāya vajrapāṇiś ca buddhānubhāvena vajrasamādhiṃ samāpannam* /
analyzed: sarva śarīram vajra mayam adhiṣṭhāya vajrapāṇiḥ ca buddha anubhāvena vajra samādhim samāpannam

original: tato vajrapāṇir buddhānubhāvena sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānāc ca sarvabodhisatvādhiṣṭhānāc ca mahākrodhasaṃbhūtaṃ vajrasārapadaṃ bhāṣate sma //
analyzed: tatas vajrapāṇiḥ buddha anubhāvena sarva buddha adhiṣṭhānāt ca sarva bodhisatva adhiṣṭhānāt ca mahā krodha saṃbhūtam vajrasāra padam bhāṣate sma

original: acchedyam abhedyaṃ satyadṛḍhasthiraṃ sarvatā pratihataṃ sarvasatvavidāraṇakaraṃ sarvasatvasādhanakaraṃ
analyzed: acchedyam abhedyam satya dṛḍha sthiram sarva tā pratihatam sarva satva vidāraṇa karam sarva satva sādhana karam

original: sarvavidyācchedanakaraṃ sarvavidyāstambhanakaraṃ sarvakarmavidhvaṃsanakaraṃ sarvakarmavidāraṇakaraṃ
analyzed: sarva vidyā chedana karam sarva vidyā stambhana karam sarva karma vidhvaṃsana karam sarva karma vidāraṇa karam

original: sarvagrahotsādanakaraṃ sarvagrahavimokṣaṇakaraṃ sarvabhūtāpakarṣaṇakaraṃ sarvavidyāmantrakarāyanakaram
analyzed: sarva graha utsādana karam sarva graha vimokṣaṇa karam sarva bhūta apakarṣaṇa karam sarva vidyā mantra kara ayana karam

original: asiddhānāṃ siddhakaraṃ siddhānāṃ cāpi vināśanakaraṃ sarvakarmapadaṃ sarvasatvānāṃ
analyzed: asiddhānām siddha karam siddhānām ca api vināśana karam sarva karma padam sarva satvānām

original: rakṣakaraṃ śāntikaṃ puṣṭikaṃ sarvasatvānāṃ stambhanakaraṃ sarvasatvānāṃ mohanakaram
analyzed: rakṣa karam śāntikam puṣṭikam sarva satvānām stambhana karam sarva satvānām mohana karam

original: idaṃ mantramahābalaṃ sarvabuddhānubhāvena yakṣendro vajrapāṇiḥ prabhāṣate sma //
analyzed: idam mantra mahābalam sarva buddha anubhāvena yakṣa indraḥ vajrapāṇiḥ prabhāṣate sma

original: namo ratnatrayāya /
analyzed: namaḥ ratnatrayāya

original: namo caṇḍavajrapāṇaye mahāyakṣasenāpataye //
analyzed: namaḥ caṇḍa vajrapāṇaye mahā yakṣa senāpataye

original: tadyathā / taṭa 2 trotaya 2 sphuṭa 2 sphoṭaya 2 ghuṇa 2 ghuṇāpaya 2 sarvasatvāni
analyzed: tat yathā taṭa trotaya sphuṭa sphoṭaya ghuṇa sarva satvāni

original: bodhaya 2 saṃbodhaya 2 trasa 2 soṃtrāsaya 2 sarvabuddhābodhinī 2 kūṭa 2 kūṭaya 2
analyzed: bodhaya saṃbodhaya trasa soṃ trāsaya sarva buddha abodhinī kūṭa kūṭaya

original: saṃkuṭaya 2 sarvaśatrūn ghaṭa 2 saṃghaṭaya 2 sarvavidyāvajra 2 sphoṭaya vajra 2 kaṭa
analyzed: saṃkuṭaya sarva śatrūn ghaṭa saṃghaṭaya sarva vidyā vajra sphoṭaya vajra kaṭa

original: vajra 2 maṭa vajra 2 pratha vajra 2 tatha sahanīlavajra suvajrāya svāhā //
analyzed: vajra su vajrāya svāhā

original: oṃ he phalini 2 gṛhṇa 2 kuru 2 mili 2 curu 2 kara 2 vajravijayāya svāhā //
analyzed: om he phalini gṛhṇa kuru mili curu kara vajra vijayāya svāhā

original: oṃ vajrakilikilmiṣa svāhā //
analyzed: om vajra kili kilmiṣa svāhā

original: oṃ kaṭa 2 maṭa 2 raṭa 2 moṭaya pramoṭanāya svāhā //
analyzed: om kaṭa maṭa raṭa moṭaya pramoṭanāya svāhā

original: oṃ cara 2 vicara 2 husara 2 māraya 2 vajravidāraṇāya svāhā //
analyzed: om cara vicara husara māraya vajra vidāraṇāya svāhā

original: oṃ chinda 2 bhinda 2 mahākilikilāya svāhā //
analyzed: om chinda bhinda mahākilikilāya svāhā

original: oṃ bandha 2 krodhavajrāya kilikilāya svāhā //
analyzed: om bandha krodha vajrāya kilikilāya svāhā

original: oṃ culu 2 caṇḍāli kilikilāya svāhā //
analyzed: om culu caṇḍāli kilikilāya svāhā

original: oṃ trāsaya kilikilāya svāhā //
analyzed: om trāsaya kilikilāya svāhā

original: oṃ hara 2 vajradharāya svāhā //
analyzed: om hara vajradharāya svāhā

original: oṃ prahara 2 vajraprabhañjanāya svāhā //
analyzed: om prahara vajraprabhañjanāya svāhā

original: ṛddhisthiravajra śrutisthiravajra pratisthiravajra mahāvajra apratihatavajra amoghavajra ehy ehi vajra śīghraṃ vajrāya svāhā //
analyzed: ṛddhi sthira vajra śruti sthira vajra pratisthira vajra mahā vajra apratihata vajra amogha vajra ehi ehi vajra śīghram vajrāya svāhā

original: aṃ dhara 2 dhiri 2 dhuru 2 huṃ huṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
analyzed: aṃ dhara dhiri dhuru hum hum phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: oṃ namaḥ samantabuddhānāṃ /
analyzed: om namaḥ samanta buddhānām

original: oṃ mahābala kaṭa vegatare acale maṇḍala māraya ativajre mahāvegaraṇapūjite jvala 2 ṭi ṭi ṭi ṭi ṭi //
analyzed: om mahā bala kaṭa vegatare acale maṇḍala māraya ati vajre mahā vegaraṇa pūjite jvala ṭi ṭi ṭi ṭi ṭi

original: nara daha 2 dhara 2 vajra tejovati tiri 2 bandha 2 mahābala vajra vajrāṅkuśa jvālaya svāhā //
analyzed: nara daha dhara vajra tejovati tiri bandha mahā bala vajra vajrāṅkuśa jvālaya svāhā

original: oṃ namo ratnatrayāya /
analyzed: om namaḥ ratnatrayāya

original: namaś caṇḍavajrapāṇaye mahāyakṣasenāpataye //
analyzed: namaḥ caṇḍa vajrapāṇaye mahā yakṣa senāpataye

original: tadyathā / oṃ hara 2 vajra matha 2 vajra dhuru 2 vajra dhara 2 vajradharāya 2 vajraripuna vajra cchinda 2 vajra bhinda 2 vajra huṃ phaṭ //
analyzed: tat yathā om hara vajra matha vajra dhuru vajra dhara vajradharāya vajraripuna vajra chinda vajra bhinda vajra hum phaṭ

original: oṃ namaś caṇḍavajrapāṇaye mahākrodhāya huru 2 vajra bandha hara 2 amṛte huṃ phaṭ svāhā //
analyzed: om namaḥ caṇḍa vajrapāṇaye mahākrodhāya huru vajra bandha hara amṛte hum phaṭ svāhā

original: hṛadayamantraḥ //
analyzed: hṛd daya mantraḥ

original: oṃ namo ratnatrayāya //
analyzed: om namaḥ ratnatrayāya

original: namaś caṇḍavajrapāṇaye huru 2 tiṣṭha 2 bandha 2 amṛte huṃ phaṭ svāhā //
analyzed: namaḥ caṇḍa vajrapāṇaye huru tiṣṭha bandha amṛte hum phaṭ svāhā

original: iti śrī vajravidāraṇā nāma dhāraṇīhṛdayopahṛdayaṃ mūlasūtraṃ samāptam //
analyzed: iti śrī vajravidāraṇā nāma dhāraṇī hṛdaya upahṛdayam mūlasūtram samāptam
